pages.title: Tiger Salamander
pages.text: The tiger salamander ($(o)Ambystoma tigrinum$()) is a species of mole salamander and one of the largest terrestrial salamanders in North America.

pages.title: Tiger Salamander
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)2 Colors ($(o)2 Rare Colors$())$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 3 Days
